metadata.title: CVE-2024-0812 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Accessibility in Google Chrome prior to121.0.6167.85 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit objectcorruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
